mapper.sql: id, question_code, option_code, option_title, option_desc, letter, order_value, is_del, create_id, last_modify_id, create_time, last_modify_time
mapper.select: select * from question_option where is_del = 0 and question_code = #{questionCode};
mapper.insert: insert into question_option (id, question_code, option_code, option_title, option_desc, letter, order_value, is_del, create_id, last_modify_id, create_time, last_modify_time) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{questionCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{optionCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{optionTitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{optionDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{letter,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orderValue,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{isDel,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lastModifyId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{lastModifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
